org.jboss.windup.exec.configuration

Class WindupConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.windup.exec.configuration.WindupConfiguration

  • public class WindupConfiguration
extends Object
    Configuration of WindupProcessor.
    Author:
    Ondrej Zizka, ozizka at redhat.com, Lincoln Baxter, III

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      WindupConfiguration() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      WindupConfiguration addDefaultUserIgnorePath(Path path)
      Adds a path to the list of default Paths with directories/files that contain files with regexes of file names to be ignored.
      WindupConfiguration addDefaultUserRulesDirectory(Path path)
      Contains a list of Paths with the directory that contains user provided rules.

      Gets all the directories/files in which the regexes for ignoring the files is placed.

      Contains a list of Paths with directories that contains user provided rules.

      Gets the GraphContext instance on which the WindupProcessor should execute.

      Contains the path to the input file (or directory) to be processed

      • getAllUserRulesDirectories

        public Iterable<Path> getAllUserRulesDirectories()
        Gets all user rule directories. This includes both the ones that they specify (eg, /path/to/rules) as well as ones that Windup provides by default (eg, WINDUP_HOME/rules and ~/.windup/rules).

      • getAllIgnoreDirectories

        public Iterable<Path> getAllIgnoreDirectories()
        Gets all the directories/files in which the regexes for ignoring the files is placed. This includes the file/directory specified by the user and the default paths that are WINDUP_HOME/ignore and ~/.windup/ignore.
        Returns:

      • getDefaultUserRulesDirectories

        public List<Path> getDefaultUserRulesDirectories()
        Contains a list of Paths with directories that contains user provided rules.

      • getDefaultUserIgnoreDirectories

        public List<Path> getDefaultUserIgnoreDirectories()
        Contains a default list of Paths with directories/files that contains files having regexes of file names to be ignored.

      • addDefaultUserRulesDirectory

        public WindupConfiguration addDefaultUserRulesDirectory(Path path)
        Contains a list of Paths with the directory that contains user provided rules. This method does guard against duplicate directories.

      • addDefaultUserIgnorePath

        public WindupConfiguration addDefaultUserIgnorePath(Path path)
        Adds a path to the list of default Paths with directories/files that contain files with regexes of file names to be ignored. This method does guard against duplicate directories.
